en.title: City Pulse Radio
en.label: Web experience · 2024
en.summary: Modular site and live visual identity for an experimental online radio station broadcasting from Taipei.
en.role: Art Direction · Webflow Dev · Motion Kit
en.description:
City Pulse Radio needed its live broadcast schedule to feel like the heartbeat of the city. I designed a gritty visual language and built a Webflow module library so producers could launch programme pages and playlists within minutes.

To extend the atmosphere from on-site events to the web, I delivered a VJ toolkit that plays generative animations reacting to audio inputs, synchronising venue screens and website backgrounds in real time.
highlights: 12 Webflow section modules reduced publishing time by 70%
Web Audio API captured live frequency data to drive Canvas animations
Delivered social and EDM kits to keep cross-media visuals consistent

zh.title: City Pulse Radio
zh.label: 網頁體驗 · 2024
zh.summary: 為實驗線上電台打造模組化網站與直播視覺識別。
zh.role: 視覺統籌 · Webflow 開發 · 動態套件
zh.description:
City Pulse Radio 想要在直播時段呈現動態的城市脈搏。我以粗糙顆粒質感為主軸設計視覺語言，並建立一套可即時更新的 Webflow 模組，讓節目製作人可以快速上架節目頁與播放清單。

為了增強現場氛圍，我也製作了 VJ 套件，能在演出現場及網站背景同步播放生成式動畫，並結合音訊反應的圖像。
highlights: 建立 12 種 Webflow section 模組，節省 70% 上架時間
Web Audio API 即時收集頻段資料，驅動 Canvas 動態
提供社群與 EDM 套件，維持跨媒體一致性
